content.question: The concerns described in the excerpt best reflect which of the following historical developments?

choices.label: The creation of reform organizations to address social concerns
The expansion of voting rights to most White men
The removal of American Indians to expand United States territorial control
The transformation of the economy as a result of the market revolution

content.answer: The transformation of the economy as a result of the market revolution

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
